name: Red Dead Pixel Man
description:
Red Dead Man-a 2D-action game in which you have to kill a lot of enemies to get to the goal.
The main character-red and for some reason a dead pixel man in his Arsenal rifle, which the player and will fight off the crowds of enemies.
Kill the boss in the lower level to get the super coin and win the game.
Collect 4 coins to win with a perfect result – it will be hard, but we believe in you.
Advantages of the game:
+ Beautiful pixel art.
+ Difficulty, for hardcore fans
+Intuitive controls
+Detailed physics of subjects
